item.title: What has Trump done today?
item.description: Keep tabs on the Trump administration’s daily actions and executive orders, and follow the stories that are most important to you.

item.title: How Trump uses the power of names to impose his story of America
Live updates: Senate plans vote on Trump-backed bill to avert government shutdown
item.description: The latest news on President Donald Trump’s administration and the expected Senate vote on a continuing resolution to avert a government shutdown.

item.title: Alan Simpson, three-term senator known for barbed wit, dies at 93
item.description: Pushing the 1986 immigration reform bill through Congress — his major legislative accomplishment — was like “giving dry birth to a porcupine,” he quip...

item.title: Top House Judiciary Democrat to rebut Trump’s Justice Dept. speech
